About Me

Hello, I'm a UX/UI designer based in New York City. By day, I edit multimedia content for clients like Barclays, the LA Rams, and The Executive Office of the President. Meanwhile, I'm learning HTML, CSS, Javascript, and UX Design to expand my UX/UI experience. This Portfolio is a glimpse at some of the projects I've been working on.

I am an analytical thinker with creative eye for design
